title: Saguaro National Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials               Curriculum Materials         NPS photo  Developed in conjunction with the Saguaro National Park BioBlitz celebration, the Electronic Field Trip consists of:  5 on-line GAMES that allow students to explore the plant and animal life of Saguaro National Park in fun and engaging ways;     5 coordinated LESSON plans that tie in to the themes of the Games and act as classroom extensions -- each plan offers suggestions for in-class and outdoor activities that you can do in your school;     a 50-minute video SHOW that was produced live at the BioBlitz and takes students to areas all over the park to explore its many environments.  Saguaro National Park Electronic Field Trip
